news.title: A consumer watchdog issued a warning about Google’s AI agent shopping protocol — Google says she’s wrong
news.summary: A consumer economics watchdog says Google's new Universal Commerce Protocol is ripe for misuse where consumers could pay more for items. Google denies this.

news.title: Ammobia says it has reinvented a century-old technology
news.summary: The startup has a new take on the Haber-Bosch process used to make ammonia. If Ammobia can deliver, it could change industries, from power generation to maritime shipping.
